original_text: But the houses of the villages which have no wall round about them shall be counted as the fields of the country: they may be redeemed, and they shall go out in the jubile.
korean_text: 그러나 성벽이 둘리지 아니한 촌락의 가옥은 나라의 전토와 같이 물러 주기도 할 것이요 희년에 돌려보내기도 할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: But the houses of the villages
which have no wall round about them
shall be counted as the fields of the country
and they shall go out in the jubile
